# Aurora of Hope
## Scripture
"In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of Godâ€™s grace that he lavished on us." - Ephesians 1:7-8

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the breathtaking display of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of the awe-inspiring beauty of God's creation. The dancing colors and swirling patterns of the aurora borealis evoke a sense of wonder and majesty, pointing us to the glory of God. Just as the Northern Lights illuminate the night sky, God's grace shines brightly in our lives, dispelling the darkness of sin and filling us with hope. As we marvel at the celestial spectacle, we are drawn to the richness of God's grace, which has been lavished upon us through the redemption of Jesus Christ.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we behold the breathtaking beauty of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of the splendor of Your glory. Thank You for the gift of Your grace, which illuminates our lives and fills us with hope. Help us to marvel at the wonder of Your creation and to bask in the richness of Your love. May we be filled with the joy and peace that comes from knowing You, and may our hearts be filled with gratitude for the redemption we have through Jesus Christ. Amen.
